item.description:
The 40th Annual Greater Hartford St. Patrick's Day Parade

The Parade will be Saturday, March 12th at 11:00 a.m. Come down to the parade route early and get your seat! The parade begins at Capitol Avenue by the State Capitol, takes a left on Main Street, a left on Asylum, a left on Ford Street, and then ends by the Memorial Arch. The parade is held rain or shine

Join us as we celebrate this Day, and the Irish heritage! We will be meeting at Black Eyed Sally's @ 10am and will find a viewing spot from there.

After the parade, come join the fun as we do a pub crawl of the fine Irish establisments in Hartford...celebrating and making revelry!
item.why: Why not? Everyone is Irish on St Patrick's Day (or almost St Patrick's Day)!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Everyone Loves A Parade! Come, With Us, To The St. Paddy's Day Parade...
